title: My Brother and I - repeated use of "willy-nilly"

content.question: The repeated use of the term "willy-nilly" (Paragraph 2) primarily

choices.label: reveals the ignorance of the author as a child
conveys the author's sense of haphazard unfairness
suggests that the older brother's success is attributable to luck
interjects a humorous note into an otherwise somber narrative

content.answer: conveys the author's sense of haphazard unfairness

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Explain how word choice, comparisons, and syntax contribute to the specific tone or style of a text.
